page.title: 18DAVID'S FIRST COMMUNION
page.content: On Sunday morning I got dressed and washed.I wore a white shirt,red tie and grey trousers.I was going to our church which is called Our Lady of the Rosary.In the church the children went into the hall with their candles, we walked in procession round the church and up to the altar. My Dad lit my candle.Then we carried our gold books to the altar and our family had communion. Father Meagher said the mass and then we went outside. We had our photographs taken and then we had breakfast in the hall.In the afternoon we had dinner with cakes, flans and trifle and then we played outside. After tea we played until our visitors went home. I watched television and went to bed at about 9.30pm.
